html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-01602025-02-25ESDC, DIPD
ActCanada Disability Benefit Act
SubjectCanada Disability Benefit Regulations
PrecisCANADA DISABILITY BENEFIT REGULATIONS in order to (1) provide low- and modest-income working-age individuals with severe and prolonged disabilities with a yearly maximum of $2,400 in financial support, indexed to inflation, and (2) establish how payments are calculated and made and the role of representatives of a person that needs assistance, as well as administrative processes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0035 Publication Date: 2025-03-12
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: CANADA DISABILITY BENEFIT REGULATIONS in order to (1) provide low- and modest-income working-age individuals with severe and prolonged disabilities with a  yearly maximum of $2,400 in financial support, indexed to inflation, and (2) establish how payments are calculated and made and the role of representatives of a person that needs assistance, as well as administrative processes.
